resources.string: Slice Viewer Application is not enabled.\nPlease enable in settings.
Slice Viewer Application is not installed.\nCheck Logcat for details.

The Slice Viewer APK is missing on your device or emulator.
The Slice Viewer APK is included in the codelab.
Navigate to the root of the codelab and run the following command after your phone or emulator is connected:
adb install -r -t slice-viewer.apk
The Slice Viewer APK is not enabled. Please enable in settings.
